Patterns.name: Heroes
Patterns.description: Here we consume the Marvel API to retreive Earth's mighties heroes... and villians. The data is then presented in a table with standard pagination, sorting and searching. You may also select heroes and add them to a team.

Patterns.name: Movies
Patterns.description: This page features infinite-scrolling that we use to continuously consume the The Movie DB API.It also includes a search feature to help you find your favorite flix.

Patterns.name: Q & A
Patterns.description: This page uses Google's Firebase. Cloud Firestore is a NoSQL document database that lets you easily store, sync, and query data for your mobile and web apps - at global scale.

Patterns.name: Happy Trails
Patterns.description: This page uses the Google Cloud Platform and its mapping API to display some of my favorite hiking trails around Littleton.

Patterns.name: Star Wars
Patterns.description: Test your Star Wars knowledge! Drag-and-drop each character to either the Dark-Side or the Light-Side. Your choice!

Patterns.name: Settings
Patterns.description: A theme is the set of colors that will be applied to the Angular Material components. You can also choose a route-transition. These transitions are then used when switching routes.
